subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls signed defender Leo Krupnik from Maccabi Haifa of the Israeli Premier League. Krupnik, 29, cannot be added to the team’s 24-man roster until after the international transfer window opens Wednesday. The club was also awaiting receipt of his international transfer certificate. Krupnik appeared in 30 matches last season for Maccabi Haifa, helping it win its 11th league title.
